properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 1:58PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...Forecast Flooding Changed from Moderate to Major Severity for the
following river in Illinois...Kentucky...
Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam

...Forecast Flooding Changed from Minor to Moderate Severity for the
following river in Illinois...Kentucky...
Ohio River at Shawneetown

.Heavy rainfall over the last week combined with additional
rainfall over the next 48 hours will cause flooding to develop or
worsen along the lower Ohio River. Minor flooding is forecast from
Newburgh Dam to Smithland Dam, except for Shawneetown, where moderate
flooding is now expected. Moderate flooding is expected from Paducah
to Cairo, except at Olmsted Dam, where major flooding is now
expected.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/

NWSheadline: forecast flooding increased from Moderate to Major severity
